author: Epic Games
description:
Battlefield 6 Open Beta begins this weekend.
 
Be among the first to jump into the BIGGEST Battlefield Beta yet. Squad up, play new maps and modes, and experience intense all-out warfare with stunning visuals and next-gen gameplay.
 
Get ready to fight, win, and make your mark in the Battlefield 6 Open Beta!
 
Early access begins August 7: https://epic.gm/battlefield6-beta
 
Weekend 1: August 9 - 10
Weekend 2: August 14 - 17
  
Subscribe and hit the notification bell to stay updated on the latest news and updates.
 
Pre-purchase Battlefield 6: https://epic.gm/battlefield6
title: Battlefield 6 | Open Beta Trailer
